scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js; concurrently "postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css --watch"  "live-server ./public"
scripts.development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js; postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "postcss public/tailwind.css -o public/build/tailwind.css" "node build.js"
